titleStmt.title: Modern policy compleated, or, The publick actions and councels both civill and military of His Excellency the Lord Generall Monck under the generall revolutions since 1639, to 1660 / by David Lloyd.
titleStmt.author: Lloyd, David, 1635-1692.

notesStmt.note: Caption title for both parts reads "The second part."
